article.headline: Holy Cross 78, Navy 50
article.story: WORCESTER, Mass. (AP) -- Kevin Hamilton and Keith Simmons each scored 19 points as Holy Cross defeated Navy 78-50 Friday in the first round of the Patriot League Tournament. Kaleo Kina had 15 points for Navy (10-18). No. 2 seed Holy Cross (19-11) plays the third seed, Lehigh (19-11) in the semifinals at Holy Cross on Sunday. Lehigh defeated Colgate, 48-44 on Friday night. The Crusaders took a 43-28 lead at halftime. Then at the start of the second half, Adam Teague had 3-pointer and Kina scored 6 points to spark a 10-5 run over a 4:23 span to draw within 48-38. But Hamilton scored eight points in an 18-8 run to put the game away. Alex Vader Baan added six, including a 3-pointer to give Holy Cross an insurmountable 66-46 advantage with 7:00 left. In the first half, Navy's Greg Sprink scored inside, Matt Fanin added a free throw and Corey Baldwin also converted inside, to tie it 17-17 with 10:19 left. But with Kina on the bench with two personal fouls, Holy Cross pressured Navy into four key turnovers and several missed shots. Tim Clifford and Colin Cunningham each scored 5 points, including 3-pointers, as Holy Cross took a 33-17 lead with 4:19 remaining. Navy's Corey Johnson snapped the string with a 3-pointer, but Simmons immediately responded with a three, to give the Crusaders the lead at intermission.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
